org.convertertopdf.management

Class SimpleFileConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.convertertopdf.management.AbstractConverter
      • org.convertertopdf.management.SimpleFileConverter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImageConverter, TxtConverter

    public abstract class SimpleFileConverter
extends AbstractConverter
    Abstract class that is responsible for providing operations to convert simple files files to PDF. Simple files: txt, bmp, gif, jpeg, png, tiff.
    Author:
    Thiago Leite e-mail: thiagoleiteecarvalho@gmail.com
